alert.note: Alert for Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:23PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Southampton County through 500 PM EDT... At 423 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Newsoms, or near Boykins, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. In addition, Doppler radar has indicated weak rotation with this storm. While a tornado is not immediately likely, remain alert for any warnings. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Newsoms around 435 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Capron and Shiloh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
